abstract: Comprehensive accessibility (a11y) guide for React and Next.js applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 40+ rules across 10 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (semantic HTML, keyboard navigation) to incremental (testing and validation). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and WCAG 2.2 references to guide automated refactoring and code generation for inclusive web applications.
